title: Books of Chronicles
summary: The Book of Chronicles (Hebrew: דִּבְרֵי־הַיָּמִים‎ Divrê Hayyāmîm) is a book in the Hebrew Bible. Chronicles is the final book of the Hebrew Bible, concluding the third section of the Jewish Tanakh, the Ketuvim ("Writings"). It contains a genealogy starting with Adam and a history of ancient Judah and Israel up to the Edict of Cyrus in 539 BCE.
